artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Sanoya Kihei
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: standing woman with head slightly bend and turned to PR; woman holds an inverted straw basket (?) in her PL hand and a yellow and black striped object in her PR hand; woman wears kimono in blue, grey, green, white, black with white geometric patterning and blue with white floral pattern
inscription: Died on Jan 7, Tenpo_ 13. Posthumous name: Yu_yoh_ atestugei shinji, age of 31, berried at Daiunji temple, Oshiage | Farewell poem
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: 五渡亭國貞画 {Gototei Kunisada ga}
title: Memorial Portrait of the Actor Segawa Kikunojō V
